#summary Sample Queries
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

The following is a quick sample of using Repose to perform queries.


= Examples =

Get all Bugs.

{{{
$bugs = $session->createQuery('FROM sample_Bug')->execute();
}}}

Get all Bugs for a specific Project.

{{{
$query = $session->createQuery('sample_Bug bug WHERE bug.project.projectId = :projectId');
$bugs = $query->execute(array('projectId' => $projectId));
}}}

Get all Bugs for a specific Project Manager.

{{{
$query = $session->createQuery(
    'FROM sample_Bug bug WHERE bug.project.manager.userId = :userId'
);
$bugs = $query->execute(array('userId' => $userId));
}}}

Get all Projects for Bugs owned by a specific User.

{{{
$query = $session->createQuery(
    'SELECT bug.project FROM sample_Bug bug WHERE bug.owner.userId = :userId'
);
$projects = $query->execute(array('userId' => $userId));
}}}
